messages.title: In many parts of Scotland...
messages.content: It's a two horse race In many areas, it's a choice between the Lib Dems or Labour. The Conservatives and SNP cannot win.

messages.title: When people voted Labour, they never thought it would be like this...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Failed us on sleaze and scandal
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Several Labour MPs face prison over their shameful abuse of MP's expenses. Former Labour Ministers were caught on camera offering to influence Government policy for cash.
Labour's heartless decision to abolish the 10p tax rate doubled the tax paid by low-paid workers and pensioners. It was a shocking betrayal of some of the least well off people in Scotland.
Scotland will be paying the price for Labour's recession for decades. Labour are saying that cuts to services will be even worse than those experienced in the 1980s under Thatcher.

mentions.tacticalSituation: ONLY THE LIB DEMS OR LABOUR CAN WIN

issues.economy: Scotland will be paying the price for Labour's recession for decades.
issues.governance: Several Labour MPs face prison over their shameful abuse of MP's expenses. Former Labour Ministers were caught on camera offering to influence Government policy for cash.
